pullrequest.title: Feature System Part 3: Revolute Joint (plus framework for other joint types)

content.raw:
We've resolved several issues that were causing windows build failures, but I've found a tough one. There is a repeatable internal compiler error when building `INTEGRATION_FrameSemantics` (detailed console output in [this gist](https://gist.github.com/scpeters/b54f2d09417e61f6529e102a135d90dd))

I'm going to try reproducing it on my local machine

* [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ign_physics-pr-win&build=45)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ign_physics-pr-win/45/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ign_physics-pr-win/45/consoleFull
